org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class BandwidthRestriction

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.BandwidthRestriction

public class BandwidthRestriction
extends java.lang.Object

The hibernate object for persisting bandwidth restrictions for the WCT.

Author:
nwaight
